text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
I have a great idea!!! This year, let's rent 
out an island while the cherry blossoms are 
in full bloom, and make the most of it!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
―― I was told to get on a boat, but it looks 
like there's been a bit of an accident.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Sei-chan loves this～. It's an island full of 
cats instead of cherry blossoms.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Kitty cat, kitty cat, lets take a little nap 
together me～ow ♪

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Well, what a warm welcome～. I might stay here 
for a while meow～.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm… This picture turned out pretty nice, a 
cat on a deserted island.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Wah!? They keep getting too close, I can't 
get a good picture, so I'm going to go…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Well, I guess panicking wont get us anywhere. 
I think I'll take a little nap too.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Luckily, I don't think Sky or Taishin-san are 
around either.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Haaaah…! I know this isn't the time or place 
for this… but I feel like I'm being healed～.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Fluffy… fluffy… This must be 
what heaven feels like…

A few hours later, the three were found by a 
search and rescue team. They were all 
sleeping happily with the cats.
